Faq.title: FAQ
Faq.description: Find out why DIGTRACKS is the best record pool for both beginner and expert DJs!

items.question: What is DIGTRACKS?
items.answer: DIGTRACKS is a leading digital record pool for DJs, providing a vast library of new music, remixes, and classics from around the world. We serve both professional and aspiring DJs with high-quality audio files ready for any performance.

items.question: Does DIGTRACKS work with Serato and other DJ software?
items.answer: Yes, DIGTRACKS integrates seamlessly with all major DJ software, including Serato, Rekordbox, Traktor, VirtualDJ, and DJAY. Our music files are standard MP3s, which are compatible with virtually all DJ applications and hardware.

items.question: How much does DIGTRACKS cost?
items.answer: DIGTRACKS offers flexible subscription plans to fit your needs. Please visit our pricing page for the most up-to-date information on our subscription costs and any promotional offers for new members.

items.question: Why is DIGTRACKS better than other record pools?
items.answer: DIGTRACKS stands out with its exclusive remixes, vast global catalog, expertly curated playlists, and innovative features like the DIGTRACKS mobile app for remote downloads. We provide unparalleled value and tools to help you stay ahead in the DJ world.

edits.title: DOWNLOADS ARE FOREVER
edits.description:
Enter the era of music ownership once again.
Unmatched stability unaffected by internet conditions,
plus the freedom of mixing with stem files.

mobileApp.title: FIND ON MOBILE, DOWNLOAD LATER
mobileApp.description:
Anytime, anywhere (on mobile)

CookiePolicy.section1Content: Cookies are small text files that a website sends to your computer or mobile device when you visit the site. Cookies are used to improve website functionality, remember your preferences, and analyze website usage.
CookiePolicy.section2Intro: We use the following types of cookies:
CookiePolicy.essentialCookiesDesc: Required for the basic functionality of the website. Without these, some parts of the site may not work correctly.
CookiePolicy.functionalCookiesDesc: Remember your preferences and choices to provide a more personalized experience.
CookiePolicy.analyticsCookiesDesc: Help us analyze website usage to improve our services. This may include third-party services like Google Analytics.
CookiePolicy.advertisingCookiesDesc: Used to display relevant ads based on your interests.
CookiePolicy.section3Intro: You can control cookie acceptance by changing your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to:
CookiePolicy.notifyOnCookies: Be notified each time a cookie is set
CookiePolicy.section3Note: Please note that rejecting cookies may cause some parts of the website to stop functioning correctly.
CookiePolicy.section4Content: Our website may use cookies provided by third-party services (such as Google Analytics or social media platforms) for analysis and marketing purposes. These cookies are managed according to each provider's privacy policy.
CookiePolicy.section5Content: We may update this Cookie Policy in response to legal changes or service improvements. We will notify you of any changes on the website.
CookiePolicy.section6Content: If you have any questions regarding this Cookie Policy, please contact us through our contact page.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy Terms
PrivacyPolicy.section1Content: Digtracks.com complies with laws and guidelines regarding the protection of personal information.
PrivacyPolicy.section2Content: Personal information refers to information about a living individual that can identify a specific person by name, date of birth, address, phone number, or other descriptions. This includes information that can be easily compared with other data to identify a specific individual.
PrivacyPolicy.section3Title: 3. Use within the Scope of Purpose
PrivacyPolicy.section3Content: Digtracks.com handles personal information only within the scope necessary to achieve the previously specified purpose of use, except with prior consent or as permitted by law.
PrivacyPolicy.section4Content: When collecting personal information, we will notify you of the purpose and collect only the necessary scope of information.
PrivacyPolicy.section5Content: When entrusting the handling of personal information to a subcontractor, Digtracks.com will take appropriate measures, such as entering into a contract, to ensure that personal information is handled safely within the scope of the entrusted business.
PrivacyPolicy.section6Content: Digtracks.com strives to keep the personal information accurate and up-to-date within the scope of the purpose of use. We take necessary and appropriate safety management measures in line with current technical standards to prevent unauthorized access, leakage, alteration, loss, or damage.
PrivacyPolicy.section7Content: Unless required by law or special circumstances, we will not disclose or provide your personal information to third parties other than our affiliates, subcontractors, or business partners without your prior consent.
PrivacyPolicy.section8Title: 8. Compliance and Review of Laws and Norms
PrivacyPolicy.section8Content: We comply with laws and norms applicable to personal information and will periodically review and improve our efforts to further protect your personal information.
PrivacyPolicy.section9Content: If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our contact page.

TermsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
TermsOfUse.intro: The terms of use and definitions stated herein are established as those understood and agreed upon by the customer at the time of completion of the application for the music subscription service "DIGTRACKS.com" (hereinafter referred to as "this service").
TermsOfUse.intro1: • DIGTRACKS.com is a digital record pool service exclusively for music promoters and professionals involved in the music industry (such as DJs) operated by our company.
TermsOfUse.intro2: • The contents specified in these terms also apply to users who only view this website.
TermsOfUse.intro3: • If you do not agree to these terms, please leave this website immediately or stop using the service.
TermsOfUse.intro4: • By agreeing to these terms, members using this service are permitted to use our software, related applications (hereinafter referred to as "apps"), documents, data, and updates or upgrades.
TermsOfUse.section1Content: The license for use applies only to the personal use of the member and is granted only if the following conditions are met:
section1Items: 1. Connect to and use this service only on terminals/devices owned by the member.
2. The app used for downloading or connecting to this service complies with these terms.
4. Do not delete or change copyrights, trademarks, or brand names within this service.
5. Do not disassemble or reverse engineer this site.
6. Do not transfer the license to others without our permission.
7. Do not upload data containing computer viruses or harmful software.
8. Do not export software in violation of Japanese laws.
9. Do not use from countries considered to be supporting terrorists.
10. Do not use for commercial purposes without our permission.
11. Do not access, create, or modify the source code of our software.
12. Do not interfere with the use of other members.
13. Do not monitor or analyze the behavior of users of this service.
14. Do not infringe upon or obstruct our security.
15. Do not upload data that is not permitted to be shared.
TermsOfUse.section1Footer: • Failure to comply with the above conditions may result in termination of membership.
TermsOfUse.section2Content: We may change or revise these terms without the customer's consent. Such changes will be effective from the time they are posted, so please check them again while using the service.
TermsOfUse.section3Content:
• This service only handles music for promotional purposes provided by labels and promotion companies. All intellectual property of these music sources is the property of the respective label or artist, and we have received appropriate permission for use within this service.
• The use of copyrights, trademarks, logos, our company name, or third-party names without our permission is prohibited.
TermsOfUse.section4Content:
• When registering as a member or provider, you will be required to provide an email address and personal information.
• Cancellation of paid plans is the responsibility of the member and must be performed by the member themselves by connecting to this service. We do not provide refunds for membership fees.
TermsOfUse.section5Content:
• We grant the customer permission to use music data through this service for promotional purposes only, without time limit.
• In using the music data through this service, the customer must not infringe upon the property, privacy, intellectual property rights (such as copyrights), or any other rights of our company, the seller, or any third party.
TermsOfUse.section6Content:
• DIGTRACKS.com may terminate the customer's contract without any warning.
• If it is determined that the customer has used music data outside the scope permitted by us, or if access information (email and password) has been distributed to third parties, we will immediately terminate the contract.
• These terms remain effective even after the contract is terminated.
TermsOfUse.section7Title: Changes or Suspension of Access Rights
TermsOfUse.section7Content: • We may change, limit, or suspend access rights to this service without prior notice to members. If access rights are suspended for violating or infringing upon these terms of use, you may not connect or re-register without our permission.
TermsOfUse.section8Content:
• Payment is by credit card (monthly) only.
• The initial payment is charged on the day of joining the paid plan. Subsequent payments are charged on the 1st of every month.
• After joining a paid plan, fees will be charged until cancellation, regardless of whether the site is used.
• Even if the account is suspended due to non-payment of the card, usage fees will continue to accrue until cancellation is processed. Unpaid amounts will be billed retroactively.
• Any disputes regarding fees or other obligations between the customer and the credit card company shall be resolved between the parties involved, and we shall not be held responsible.
• If the contract is terminated due to fraud by the customer, usage fees will not be refunded.
TermsOfUse.section9Content: • Persons under the age of 18 cannot use this service.
TermsOfUse.section10Content: • We may display advertisements or promotions using banners, links, coupons, etc., through our site, apps, or third-party apps and sites.
TermsOfUse.section11Content:
• Please register using the application form before using this service. The personal information provided in the form must be the accurate information of the actual user.
• If it is determined that there is fraud in the application details, registration may be cancelled and legal action may be taken.
TermsOfUse.section12Content:
• We issue passwords to those who have applied for this service for use during access.
• Customers must not use other customers' accounts, emails, or passwords. Also, you must not transfer your password to a third party.
• If you determine that your password has been used unauthorized by a third party, you are obligated to report it to us immediately.
TermsOfUse.section13Content:
• All intellectual property rights, including copyrights, related rights, brand names, trademarks, and industrial property rights, as well as know-how related to music data and content, belong to us or the rightful rights holders.
• Customers must not modify, copy, or distribute music data without written consent from the rights holder.
TermsOfUse.section14Content:
• If you are the copyright holder of data used on this site and believe your copyright has been infringed, please send a notice to our representative including the following:
  1. A copy of the signature or mark used for the infringed copyright.
  2. Copyright certificate and registration number.
  3. A description of how it was infringed on this site and the location of the data.
  4. Contact information for the owner.
• After receiving the notice and confirming the content, the infringing data will be deleted. We will also notify the member who uploaded the data of the deletion and inform them of their right to submit a counter-notice.
TermsOfUse.section15Content:
• If a member suspected of infringement (hereinafter referred to as the "infringer") wishes to claim they did not infringe, please send a counter-notice to our representative including the following:
  1. The infringer's signature.
  2. The content of the deleted data and its location before deletion.
  3. An explanation of why the deleted data is believed not to be infringing.
  4. Contact information for the infringer.
• After receiving the counter-notice and confirming the content, it will be forwarded to the owner claiming infringement. If there is no response from the owner that they are taking legal action, the deleted data will be re-uploaded within 10 days.
TermsOfUse.section16Content:
• We do not provide any support for the computers, communication equipment, or software used by customers, nor do we accept complaints regarding connections with various providers. We cannot guarantee if music data cannot be used due to the customer's PC or OS environment. Please check carefully before applying.
• Customers agree in advance that the quality of this service may be affected by connection status, communication speed, or performance of devices used. We do not provide any guarantee regarding uniformity, reproducibility, stability, or suitability for a specific purpose.
TermsOfUse.section17Content:
• We explicitly disclaim all kinds of express or implied warranties, including rights, merchantability, and fitness for a specific purpose, regarding all content related to this service and site. We will make our best effort for smooth use, but we cannot guarantee constant operation. Therefore, to the extent permitted by law, we are not responsible for troubles arising from this site or apps, including:
  1. Special, indirect, punitive, incidental, or consequential damages or losses.
  2. Interruption of use or corruption of data.
  3. Damage and property damage.
  4. Non-performance or delay due to circumstances beyond our control.
  5. Harmful programs such as viruses, bugs, or Trojans, regardless of the source.
• Customers agree to indemnify us from any claims including losses, liabilities, and attorney fees regarding use or misuse of this site.
TermsOfUse.section18Content: • We shall not be held liable for any delay or inability to provide this service, non-delivery of information, or any other damages related to the music data itself or its use, regardless of predictability, unless there is intentional or gross negligence on our part.
TermsOfUse.section19Content: • We shall not be held liable for any failure to perform obligations under these terms due to force majeure, such as natural disasters, government orders, strikes, or failure of machinery or communication systems.
TermsOfUse.section20Title: Prohibition of Transfer of Rights and Obligations
TermsOfUse.section20Content: • Customers shall not assign, transfer, or otherwise dispose of any rights or obligations based on these terms to a third party without our written consent.
TermsOfUse.section21Content: • Even if any part of these terms is judged invalid or illegal by a court, the validity and legality of the remaining terms shall not be affected.
TermsOfUse.section22Content: • These terms shall be governed by Japanese law. Any disputes arising between us and the customer shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Tokyo District Court as the court of first instance.
TermsOfUse.section23Content:
• All rights not explicitly granted to members in these terms are reserved by this service. Registration does not constitute any partnership, joint venture, or agency agreement. If any part of the terms is invalid, it shall be removed while the rest remains effective.
• Copying these terms and using them unauthorized without our permission is prohibited.
